definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Among them, there was the herb Tuckahoe grown in Yunnan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.chinese: 這些中藥中就有生長於雲南和貴州的茯苓。

sentences.english: To clarify the safety of Monascus and Chinese traditional medicine synbiotics.
sentences.chinese: 闡明紅曲黴與健胃中藥合生素的安全性。

sentences.english: The sources of Chinese medicine are mainly floras, also includes animals and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中藥的來源主要是植物，也有一些動物和礦物。

sentences.english: Objective To study the receptor mechanism of anti-convulsant effect of Caoguo Zhimu Decoction (CZD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥草果知母湯抗癇作用的受體機制。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the traditional Chinese medicine slimming capsule of the role of weight loss.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察複方中藥減肥膠囊的減肥作用。

sentences.english: Identification of the Chinese drug Malanye and its adulterants.
sentences.chinese: 中藥馬藍葉及其混亂品的比較鑑別。

sentences.english: In addition, MRP2 also influences the complicated absorption process of the traditional Chinese medicine, in particul…
sentences.chinese: 此外，MRP2還影響着中藥成分的腸吸收過程。

sentences.english: The prescription given by the doctor contains the traditional Chinese medicine Sarcandra Glabra .
sentences.chinese: 醫生開的藥方裏，包括草珊瑚這味中藥。

sentences.english: This is a view on the chemical composition and Pharmacological Function of Colla Corii Asini.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了中藥阿膠的化學成分及其藥理藥效作用。

sentences.english: In addition, Chinese external medicine provided necessary support for treating ulcer after the surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中藥外用藥的應用對創面的癒合提供了有力保障。

sentences.english: Also, sure to select the pure Chinese, not counterproductive.
sentences.chinese: 還有，肯定要選擇純中藥，沒有反作用的。

sentences.english: We are to push traditional Chinese medicine to the world and carry forward to a higher level of development.
sentences.chinese: 健心人要把中藥推向世界，將其發揚光大。

sentences.english: 2010 is the most popular is the "Xiuting", and Chinese medicine products.
sentences.chinese: 2010年最盛行就是“秀挺”了，中藥產品。

sentences.english: To develop determination method of ursolic acid in Chinese herb disinfector with HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 建立中藥消毒劑中熊果酸的高效液相色譜法。

sentences.english: Fuxinning Capsule is a safe and effective new drug of Chinese herbal medicine for VPC .
sentences.chinese: 復心寧膠囊是一種安全有效的治療室性早搏中藥新藥。

sentences.english: The TCM approach is fundamentally different from that of Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中醫中藥的方法是根本不同的西方從那個。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
traditional Chinese medical science/a doctor trained in Chinese medicine
Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine
to nurse one's health/to recuperate/to take care of/to look after/to discipline/to educate/to train/to prepare food/(dialect) to make fun of/(medicine) to opsonize
